cause.description:
Help orphans see a better part of life that we have and exeprience everyday...the life that we take for granted, children cry for everyday. Either be happy and appreciate what u have in life or giv it to an orphan who would make better use of it!
1. Give Ophans a better quality of life
2. Free them from Slavery
3. Let them live their childhood, and grow up as equal men and women
cause.mission: Provide a better life for unfortunate kids
cause.name: Orphaned Children
